divs: Sighting Detailswell it was exactly 7:48 pm because of so many sightings we've had i always check the time before i look up to stargaze and last night was no excetion, it was me my father in law and a long time friend, we went out specically to look for ufo's as we've seen them before and beleive there is a upswing in sightings, when we all looked up we immediatly saw two stars that seemed to move then one became much brighter than all the stars in the sky then it decended almost to the ground, mind you we were far away from what we saw but it was a very dramatic drop then it gained altitude at near split second speed passed where we first saw it then it went to a little bunch of stars and kind of hid among them but we continued to watch it for about 20 minutes as that one seemed to be watching us the other one was cruising around the sky darting about in random patterns moving like something other than conventioal aircraft, after a few seconds maybe 20 to 30 seconda then dissappeared after that we focused on the first, then we saw 5 more racing across the sky going south towards the patch of stars that the first one was camoflaged in then the first star or whatever they were joined the rest of the lights that was passing by and they all flew off towards the south together, now what we saw was pretty incredible but not surprising as we here in merced see this type of action almost every night and feel that any true investigator will have no problem filming them as i have a digital camera, these things are to high for my camera to pick up but whatever it is it sure seems to be taking a closer look at us or are getting very comfortable
